Pick a color from color input: Pick a color from color input
The attribute containing a valid color,: The attribute containing a valid color, supported color formats are hexadecimal, rgb and rgba. Non-color formats such as ‘red’ are not supported.
The presentation of the color picker: The presentation of the color picker
The various different styles, for how th: The various different styles, for how the color picker should look when clicked.
The format that which the selected color: The format that which the selected color will be saved as.
This is a list of pre-defined colors use: This is a list of pre-defined colors used within the color picker.
Valid color value: #d0d0d0, rgb(115,159,: Valid color value: #d0d0d0, rgb(115,159,159) or rgba(195,226,226,1)
Message shown when the user provides a w: Message shown when the user provides a wrong input, :colors: will be replaced by a sample format.
